articles.title: "Passengers Should Be Proud" Of Pilots: SpiceJet On Patna Emergency Landing
articles.description: A day after the Patna-Delhi SpiceJet plane with around 185 passengers on board made an emergency landing in Patna after its wing caught fire, SpiceJet Chief of Flight Operations appealed to all passengers to 'be proud of its pilots'.
articles.content:
SpiceJet praised pilot Monica Khanna & first officer Balpreet Singh Bhatia for the safe landing.

articles.title: Explained: Making sense of Covid spike
articles.description: Active cases in Maharashtra have risen 15 times in a month, with even previously infected people catching the virus. What explains the spike, how different are the symptoms, and what precautions should you take?
